Alchemist.primePerkDesc: Alchemist can have 3 additional Concoction buffs active.

Vial: Stone Mist.name: Vial: Stone Mist
Vial: Stone Mist.desc: Creates vapor cloud, lasts 10s, gives STONESKIN. STONESKIN reduces incoming damage by 25%, stagger -1, increases Blight Buildup Decay Rate, grants status effect immunity. Lasts 15s.

Vial: Frenzy Dust.name: Vial: Frenzy Dust
Vial: Frenzy Dust.desc: Creates a mysterious vapor cloud which lasts 10s and applies FRENZIED. FRENZIED increases Fire Rate, Reload Speed, and Melee Speed by 20%, and the Movement Speed by 15%. Lasts 15s.

Vial: Elixir of Life.name: Vial: Elixir of Life
Vial: Elixir of Life.desc: Creates vapor cloud that lasts 10s and applies LIVING WILL. LIVING WILL grants 5 HP/s, and protects against fatal damage. Can revive downed players. Lasts 20s. Revived allies cannot be affected by Living Will for 180s.

Alchemist.name: Alchemist

passive2.name: Panacea
passive2.desc: Curative effects grant +15 Resistance. Allies within 15m gain effects, +10 Resistance.

passive3.name: Gold to Lead
passive3.desc: Picking up Scrap or Metals has a 15% chance to award Ammo to the Alchemist.

passive4.name: Experimentalist
passive4.desc: Using a Relic applies a random buff on the Alchemist and all allies within 20m for 60s. Cannot be overriden.

Archon.primePerkDesc: Automatically generate 3 Mod Power per second. Casting a mod increases mod generation by 100% for 10s.

Reality Rune.name: Reality Rune
Reality Rune.desc: Conjures a 7m protective dome which applies SLOW to any enemy or enemy projectile. Allies inside gain 25% DR. Lasts 15s.

Chaos Gate.name: Chaos Gate
Chaos Gate.desc: Conjures a 7m unstable zone which grants allies 15% increased damage dealth, 25% incread Mod Generation, but increases damage that allies take by 15%. Lasts 20s.

Havoc Form.name: Havoc Form
Havoc Form.desc: Gain new abilities 30s. Duration reduced on ability use. FIRE: 720 shock/s to targets within 15m. AIM: 3m shield, deals 35 shock/s and reduces incoming damage to all allies by 50%. DODGE: Blink Evade that deals 450 shock within 5m.

Archon.name: Archon

passive2.name: Power Creep
passive2.desc: Mod use: 5% mod power spent regened by team over 10s. While active, allies gain 5% Mod Power Generation.

passive3.name: Spirit Within
passive3.desc: Mod Power/charge -15%, refunds 15% Mod cost, split among active mods.

passive4.name: Power Leak
passive4.desc: Using a Relic grants 200 Mod Power for both equipped Mods, and an additional 100 to current Mod.

Challenger.primePerkDesc: When receiving fatal damage, the Challenger becomes invulnerable for 3s and regerates 100% of Max Health. Can only happen once every 10 minutes. Resets at Worldstone or on death.

War Stomp.name: War Stomp
War Stomp.desc: Creates a high-impact tremor that deals 450 damage and additional stagger in a forward cone up to 7.5m. Deals damage in all directions at point blank range.

Juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.desc: Become nearly unstoppable, gaining 3 stack of BULWARK, 15% increased Movement and Melee Speed, and 50% increased Melee Damage. Stagger Level reduced by 1. Lasts 25s.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.desc: Fire Rate +15%, Reload Speed +20%, and Movement Speed +10%. Lasts 10s. Kills/High DMG grant 1 RAGE stack - increases Ranged Damage +2.5%/Stack. At 10 Stacks, gain BERSERK: reloads current firearm, x2 Rampage effects for 15s.

Challenger.name: Challenger

passive1.name: Close Quarters
passive1.desc: Grants +35% All Damage to enemies within 10m. Bonus tapers off up to 20m. CC increased up to 10%.

passive2.name: Intimidating Presence
passive2.desc: Skill use reduces enemy DMG within 15m by 10%, +2.5%/enemy (Max 10%)

passive3.name: Powerlifter
passive3.desc: Both the Stamina cost increase for each weight bracket and Stamina Regen Delay are reduced by 50%.

passive4.name: Face of Danger
passive4.desc: Using a Relic within 10m of an enemy grants 2 stacks of Bulwark and 10% increased Damage for 10s.

Engineer.primePerkDesc: Holding the SKILL button will Overclock a Carried or Deployed Heavy Weapon. Overclocking grants Infinite Ammo, increased Fire Rate, and a 25% Damage increase for 25s.

Heavy Weapon: Vulcan.name: Heavy Weapon: Vulcan
Heavy Weapon: Vulcan.desc: Deploys a Vulcan Cannon Turret which lasts until is ammo is exhausted. Turrets will prioritize what the player aims at. Skill press will enable auto targeting.

Heavy Weapon: Flamethrower.name: Heavy Weapon: Flamethrower
Heavy Weapon: Flamethrower.desc: Deploys a Flamethrower Turret which lasts until is ammo is exhausted. Turrets will prioritize what the player aims at. Skill press will enable auto targeting.

Heavy Weapon: Impact Cannon.name: Heavy Weapon: Impact Cannon
Heavy Weapon: Impact Cannon.desc: Deploys a Impact Cannon Turret which lasts until is ammo is exhausted. Turrets will prioritize what the player aims at. Skill press will enable auto targeting.

Engineer.name: Engineer

passive2.name: Magnetic Field
passive2.desc: Heavy Weapons grant 15% DR and gradually restore ammo to allies within 2.5m.

passive3.name: Heavy Mobility
passive3.desc: While carrying a Heavy Weapon, +35% Movement Speed, Evade Speed/Distance +25%.

passive4.name: Surplus
passive4.desc: Relic use: refills 15% Heavy Weapon. Doubled if HW stowed. If Stowed HW is full, +ammo drop based on the surplus.

Explorer.primePerkDesc: Grants a 35% chance to spawn additional items and rarer drops when defeating stronger enemies.

Plainswalker.name: Plainswalker
Plainswalker.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 20% and reduces Stamina Cost by 80% for all allies. Lasts 30s.

Gold Digger.name: Gold Digger
Gold Digger.desc: Dig into the ground to spring a fountain which grants a random buff. Fountains last 45s and their buffs last 20s. Fountains can grant either: 10% increased All Damage, 15% DR, 2.4 HP/s, or HASTE.

Fortune Hunter.name: Fortune Hunter
Fortune Hunter.desc: Reveal special items within 40m for all allies. Lasts 60s.

Explorer.name: Explorer

passive1.name: Scavenger
passive1.desc: Pickup stacks grant +5% All Damage and +5% CC for 20s. Can +Duration up to 60s. Max 5 stacks.

passive2.name: Metal Detector
passive2.desc: Ammo, Currency, Metal Drop Chance for party +10% and +chance of Consumables dropping from Chests.

passive3.name: Prospector
passive3.desc: Relic Frag pickups +quality. 5% chance to gain 2nd of the same type/quality.

passive4.name: Self Discovery
passive4.desc: Using a Relic instantly fills Scavenger Stacks, grants +1 Stack, and prevents Stack Decay for 30s.

Gunslinger.primePerkDesc: When activiating any Gunslinger Skill, both weapons are instantly reloaded, and gain infinite reserve ammo on all weapons for 8s.

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.desc: Pull out your trusty side piece and unload up to 6 Critical Shots from the hip. Each shot deals 105 base damage and double stagger value.

Sidewinder.name: Sidewinder
Sidewinder.desc: Calls upon the power of the Desert Sidewinder snake to increase ADS Movement Speed and Draw/Swap Speed by 50%. Cycling weapons will automatically reload incoming Firearms. Lasts 12s.

Bulletstorm.name: Bulletstorm
Bulletstorm.desc: Fire Rate +20%, Reload Speed +50%. Lasts 20s. Single Shot weapons become full-auto. Kills reload weapon. Bows and Crossbows instead gain +15%CC and +50% Projectile Speed.

Gunslinger.name: Gunslinger

passive1.name: Swift Shot
passive1.desc: Gain 15% Fire Rate, 25% Ranged Damage, and 5% Crit Chance for all firearms.

passive2.name: Posse Up
passive2.desc: Ammo pickups +30%/player, split equally. Ammo Boxes drop more ammo.

passive3.name: Quick Hands
passive3.desc: Firearms +10% Reload Speed. DOUBLED is mag is empty.

passive4.name: Sleight of Hand
passive4.desc: Using a Relic reloads equipped firearm and increases Ranged Damage by 15% for 10s.

Handler.primePerkDesc: When Handler is downed, Companion will attempt to revive them at 50% Max Health. Can be used to revive allies with Command. Downed ally must have a Relic charge.

Guard Dog.name: Guard Dog
Guard Dog.desc: Companion generates +15% Threat while attacking. All damage to them is reduced by 20%. HOLD: Reduces damage by 15% to allies within 20m. Companion generates Threat. Lasts 20s.

Support Dog.name: Support Dog
Support Dog.desc: Companion will follow the Handler and continuously heal allies within 3.5m for 0.25% of max HP/s. HOLD: Grants 2% max HP/s and 25% increased Movement Speed to all allies within 20m. Lasts 25s.

Attack Dog.name: Attack Dog
Attack Dog.desc: Companion deals 20% additional damage. HOLD: Increases damage by 20% for all allies within 20m. Lasts 20s.

Handler.name: Handler

passive1.name: Pack Hunter
passive1.desc: Gain +30% Ranged/Skill Damage, +5% Ranged/Skill CC while Companion is within 40m.

passive2.name: Spirit of the Wolf
passive2.desc: Move Speed +10%. Allies within 10m gain your MS(if faster). Team Stamina Cost -15%.

passive3.name: Teamwork
passive3.desc: Handler/Companion +30% Revive Speed. While reviving, both receive 50% less damage.

passive4.name: Best Friend
passive4.desc: Using a Relic fully restores Companion health and grants them 25% Damage and 35% DR for 15s.

Hunter.primePerkDesc: Dealing 55 Base Ranged Weakspot Damage extends the duration of active Hunter Skills by 3.5s. Can extend timer beyond its initial duration.

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.desc: Casts Aura that automatically applies MARK to enemies within 35m. While active, Hunter gains +15% Ranged/Melee DMG. Lasts 25s.

Hunter's Focus.name: Hunter's Focus
Hunter's Focus.desc: Aiming Down Sights uninterrupted/without shooting for 1s applies FOCUSED: reduce Weapon Spread, Recoil, Sway by 75%, +25% Ranged/Weakspot DMG, +10% Ranged CCC. While active, aiming applies MARK. Lasts 20s.

Hunter's Shroud.name: Hunter's Shroud
Hunter's Shroud.desc: Reduce enemy awareness, become harder to target. Attacks/casts end Shroud. Exiting applies MARK to enemies within 10m, grants AMBUSH for 2s: Ranged/Melee DMG +50%,diminishes over duration. Attacks apply MARK. Shroud will reapply after 1.15 sec if no action is taken.

Hunter.name: Hunter

passive1.name: Deadeye
passive1.desc: Gain 40% Ranged Damage, 15% Weakspot Damage and 5% Ranged Critical Chance.

passive2.name: Return to Sender
passive2.desc: Weakspot/Crit kills +50% ammo drops and 2x ammo drop chance.

passive3.name: Urgency
passive3.desc: Firearms +15% Reload Speed +15% Movement Speed after Kill. Lasts 5s.

passive4.name: Intuition
passive4.desc: Relic use: +duration of active Hunter Skill by 10s. Dimishes/use. Weakspot Kills against MARKED +5% Relic Speed within 15s. Stacks 10x.

Invader.primePerkDesc: Casting an Invader Skill leaves a Decoy for 3s which draws enemy fire. Deal 15% additional damage to enemies not targeting the Invader

Void Cloak.name: Void Cloak
Void Cloak.desc: Auto perfect dodge incoming direct damage for 60s. Each auto-evade reduces timer by 33% - 100% based on damage absorbed and spawns a Decoy for 3s.

Worm Hole.name: Worm Hole
Worm Hole.desc: Warps the caster forward. The next Melee or Ranged attack within 5s will deal 300% damage. Hold to display resulting location.

Reboot.name: Reboot
Reboot.desc: Saves current HP, Stamina, Relics, Ammo, and Status Effects for 30s. While active, move speed +15%, DR +10%. Reactivating restores all saved values and spawns a Decoy that lasts 3s.

Invader.name: Invader

passive1.name: S.H.A.R.K.
passive1.desc: Sprinting for 1s or Evading adds 1 stack. Stacks give Ranged/Melee (+7%DMG +1%CC) for 15s. Max 5 stacks.

passive2.name: Loophole
passive2.desc: Ally Ranged/Melee DMG against enemies distracted by Decoy grants 7.5% base damage as Lifesteal.

passive3.name: Circumvent
passive3.desc: Evade/Combat Slide cost -15%. Perfect Dodges gain an additional -15%.

passive4.name: Override
passive4.desc: Relic use: -25% Threat gen for 10s. While is active, next Evade creates Empowered Decoy, lasts 5.5s.

Medic.primePerkDesc: After restoring 250 Total Health to allies, regain a spent Relic Charge. Resting or Respawning at a Worldstone resets healing accumulation. Each additional player increases the healing requirement by 50%.

Wellspring.name: Wellspring
Wellspring.desc: Punch the ground to create a 3m Healing Spring AOE which restores 15 HP/s and increases Blight Decay Rate. Lasts 15s.

Healing Shield.name: Healing Shield
Healing Shield.desc: The Medic quickly expels healing energy to SHIELD all allies within 25m for 100% of their max HP for 10s. Heals 30% HP over the duration.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.desc: The Medic unleashes a 30m shockwave that revives downed allies and restores 75% max HP over 10s. Every additional 1s increases the heal by 75%(3% max).

Medic.name: Medic

passive2.name: Benevolence
passive2.desc: Relic Efficacy +15%. Heal nearby allies 30% of the total heal value, 60% for allies below 35% HP.

passive3.name: Backbone
passive3.desc: Increases the hits Medic can take before losing Grey Health by 2.

passive4.name: Benefactor
passive4.desc: Relic Use Speed +20%. Relic Use gains -1 Stagger.

Ritualist.primePerkDesc:
Negative Status Effects applied by Ritualist inflict Infected

Infected: Victim receives 5% more Status Effect damage, On death, spreads
all statuses to nearby enemies within 5m

Eruption.name: Eruption
Eruption.desc: Creates 1m explosion for 150 damage within 15m. Radius and Damage increases 100% for each unique Status Effect on the target. Refreshes all Status Effects on target.

Miasma.name: Miasma
Miasma.desc: Casts an AOE burst that applies BLEEDING, BURNING, OVERLOADED, and CORRODED to all enemies within 15m, and dealing a total of 1500 base damage. Lasts 11s.

Death Wish.name: Death Wish
Death Wish.desc: Negates all healing to self. Drain Health 300% over 20s. Increases all Damage by 35% and grants 10% Base Damage dealt as Lifesteal.

Ritualist.name: Ritualist

passive1.name: Wrath
passive1.desc: +20% DMG and +10% CC to enemies with negative status effects.

passive2.name: Terrify
passive2.desc: Killing applies TERRIFIED within 5m for 20s. Enemies deal -5% damage and are more likely to drop ammo.

passive3.name: Dark Blood
passive3.desc: Reduces damage received from Negative Status Effects by 25%. Reduce blight gain by 50%.

passive4.name: Purge
passive4.desc: On Relic Use, cleanses all Negative Status Effects. Effects cleansed are applied to enemies within 7.5m.

Summoner.primePerkDesc: When the Summoner deals damage to their Minion, it causes them to ENGRAGE. Minions gain 50% increased Damage, Attack Speed, and Movement Speed.

Minion: Hollow.name: Minion: Hollow
Minion: Hollow.desc: Summons a Root Hollow minion to fight by your side. Costs 15% of max HP to summon, but will not kill Summoner. Max (2).

Minion: Flyer.name: Minion: Flyer
Minion: Flyer.desc: Summons a Root Flyer minion to fight by your side. Costs 10% of max HP to summon, but will not kill Summoner. Max (2).

Minion: Reaver.name: Minion: Reaver
Minion: Reaver.desc: Summons a Root Reaver minion to fight by your side. Costs 35% of max HP to summon, but will not kill Summoner. Max (1).

Summoner.name: Summoner

passive1.name: Dominator
passive1.desc: Mod/Skill (+35%DMG, +5%CC) with active minion. Sacrifice gives Ranged/Melee (+30%DMG +5%CC), for 30s or until summon.

passive2.name: Residue
passive2.desc: Minions leave a 3m Aura on death, heals 2.5% HP/s and increases healing by 20%. Lasts 10s.

passive3.name: Outrage
passive3.desc: Sacrifice grants 3% Lifesteal/Minion Sacrificed, +15% Move Speed. Lasts 10s.
